name: Trapper (itch) (Tomate Salat)
description:
Controls

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move your robot. 

How To Play
On start you'll see a plate highlighted in red (for a short time). Avoid those plates cause they've turned into traps. 

Try to reach the other side and collect the objective. After that go back to the start (keep the traps in mind!).

On the top you can see a timer. If this is reaching zero or you've moved on a trap then the game is lost. 

You can get more time by collecting hour glasses. 

Can I Skip The Intro?
Yes - but first after you've seen it at least once. Then you can use Space, Enter or ESC in order to skip it

Used Music
Also for this game I've used the awesome music of music-loop-bundle created by tallbeard.
